# ICTML

The Interpretable Causal Targeted Machine Learning (ICTML) Project is a multi-institution 
collaboration that aims to: 

- Develop a highly efficient, user-friendly, and scalable end-to-end platform for machine learning and causal inference.
- Provide a comprehensive educational resource for the analysis of real world data.
- Support a wide national network of collaborators in cancer research to produce real world evidence for oncology.
